main.name: Sabuj Majumder
main.description: Make interior spaces functional, safe, and beautiful by determining space requirements and selecting decorative items, such as colors, lighting, and materials. They read blueprints and must be aware of building codes and inspection regulations, as well as universal accessibility standards.
main.bio: My philosophy is don’t worry about perfection, When you get an idea, take action. Just do it, execute quickly, and tweak later
main.contactmessage: HAVE A QUESTION WE HAVE ANSWERS !

resume.skillmessage: Interior Design using 3D Max, Autocad , Adobe Photoshop

Service.title: Interior Design
Service.description: Interior design is the art and science of enhancing the interior of a building to achieve a healthier and more aesthetically pleasing environment for the people using the space. An interior designer is someone who plans, researches, coordinates, and manages such projects

Service.title: Exterior Design
Service.description: Exterior design is the process of designing the exterior of the building. This includes the facade, skin ,roof, and foundational elements. While exterior design can be just as creative and artistic as interior, a knowledge of structural engineering is necessary

work.title: Interior Designer
work.description: Achieve a healthier and more aesthetically pleasing environment for the people using the space. An interior designer is someone who plans, researches, coordinates, and manages such projects

projects.title: Goshpur work
projects.category: Interior Design and Exterior Design both

testimonials.text: Let’s go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important
